name: Project Nano
description:
Project Nano created for DIG 4713 - Game Design at UCF.

Nano is a top agent of a group of hackers called Project. Using her high-tech visor, Nano can hack into any electronic to do as she wishes. When a robot uprising threatens the city, Nano is called in to stop them at their source. Become the ultimate hacker and save the city!

Web player appears to be bugged, so a downloadable file has been provided.
